title: Hospitals and doctors are ignoring RFK Jr.’s new vaccine schedule and relying on pediatricians’ guidance instead
description: Their decisions underscore a growing divide between federal health authorities and major medical groups.
content: Their decisions underscore a growing divide between federal health authorities and major medical groups.
